Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Action Surge: May take an extra action 2/short rest

Bait And Switch: May spend 1 Superiority Die to swap place w/an adjacent willing creature; choice of self or swapped creature adds rolled value to Armor Class for 1 rd
Brace: May spend 1 Superiority Die to use Reaction to attack a creature that moves into range and add roll to damage

Fighting Style (Blind Fighting): R10' Knows locations of invisible creatures
Fighting Style (Interception): R5' May use Reaction to negate 1d10+6 HP damage to another
Fighting Style (Thrown Weapon Fighting): May draw thrown weapon as part of an attack/+2 HP damage from thrown weapons
Fighting Style (Unarmed Fighting): Unarmed hit inflicts 1d8+2 bludgeoning when unarmed and shieldless or 1d4 HP to a grappled foe
Fire Rune: Hit restrains and inflicts +2d6 HP fire/rd (DC 15 Strength ends) for 1 min 2/short rest
Giant's Might: May inflict +1d10 HP damage w/a weapon or unarmed strike 1/rd for 1 min 6/long rest
Grappling Strike: After a hit, may spend 1 Superiority Die to add roll to an Athletics grapple check
Great Weapon Master: May make a bonus attack after crit or reducing foe to 0 HP/May suffer -5 attack w/a heavy weapon to gain +10 damage
Polearm Master: Successful bonus attack w/polearm butt inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning/Foe entering polearm reach provokes an OA
Protective Field: R30' May spend 1 Psionic Energy die and use Reaction to negate 1d12+4 HP damage
Psionic Strike: R30' May spend 1 Psionic Energy die after a hit to inflict +1d12+4 HP force
Quick Toss: May spend 1 Superiority Die for a bonus action to draw and throw a weapon and add roll to damage
Runic Juggernaut: Giant's Might extends reach by 5'
Runic Shield: R60' May use Reaction when an ally is hit to force a reroll 6/long rest
Savage Attacker: May take the best of two melee damage rolls 1/rd
Second Wind: May use a bonus action to regain 1d10+20 HP 1/short rest
Stone Rune: R30' May use Reaction to charm and halt target (DC 15 Wisdom ends) for 1 min 2/short rest
Storm Rune: Immune to surprise; may invoke for R60' impose Adv or Disadv on rolls for 1 min 2/short rest
Telekinetic Thrust: May inflict knocked prone or 10' push w/Psionic Strike (DC 18 Strength neg)
